cast.name: 萨曼莎·德鲁斯 Samantha Drews
卡兹米尔·米洛斯坦 Cazimir Milostan
迈克尔·德巴托罗 Michael DeBartolo

this_title: Big Bad Husband 2, Please Wake Up!
introduction: In a metropolitan city of contemporary America, the stepmother of the Holland family Bethany, and the uncle of the Lyons family Richard band together to steal an AI invention from Bethany's husband, a genius scientist. The two murder Bethany's husband and orchestrate a car crash that sends Richard's nephew Wayne Lyons into a coma, clearing Richard's way to take over the Lyons Enterprise. This mutually beneficial plan is undermined when the stepdaughter of Bethany, Ellie Holland, marries the now-awaken Wayne Lyons. The unlikely couple teams together to investigate the crime by Bethany and Richard and justice and romance ensue.
chinese_title: Big Bad Husband 2, Please Wake Up!
